notes.author: Dr. Swift (ED)
notes.content:
Patient presents with RLQ pain. Rule out Appendicitis.
Labs: Cr 2.8 (Baseline 1.0).
Plan: Order CT Abdomen/Pelvis WITH IV Contrast to visualize appendix.

ground_truth.explanation: Ordering IV Contrast in patient with acute renal failure (Cr 2.8, GFR 25) risks worsening kidney injury (CIN). Non-contrast or Ultrasound preferred.
